titles: Dirt wipt off, or, A manifest discovery of the gross ignorance, erroneousness and most unchristian and wicked spirit of one John Bunyan ... which he hath shewed in a vile pamphlet publish'd by him, against The design of Christianity ...
author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.
publisher: Printed by R.N. for Richard Royston ...,
notes: Attributed to Edward Fowler. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
The "vile pamphlet" referred to is Bunyan's A defence of the doctrine of justification by faith in Jesus Christ.
Reproduction of original in Clark Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
keywords: Bunyan, John, 1628-1688. --  Defence of the doctrine of justification by faith in Jesus Christ.
